languages.text: "Отец когда-нибудь говорил с тобой о покаянии?"
"Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"
languages.original_text: "Отец когда-нибудь говорил с тобой о покаянии?"

traits.locale_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"
"Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"
"Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"
"Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"
"Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

languages.text: “你的父亲有没有对你说过忏悔之类的事情？”
languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: “你的父亲有没有对你说过忏悔之类的事情？”

languages.text: «¿Le habló tu padre alguna vez del arrepentimiento?».
languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Le habló tu padre alguna vez del arrepentimiento?».

languages.text: 「お前の父親は、何かに後悔しているというような話をしたことはあるか？
languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の父親は、何かに後悔しているというような話をしたことはあるか？

languages.text: "Hat Euer Vater je mit Euch über Repentanz gesprochen?"
languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: "Hat Euer Vater je mit Euch über Repentanz gesprochen?"

languages.text: « Votre père vous a-t-il déjà parlé de repentance ? »
languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre père vous a-t-il déjà parlé de repentance ? »

languages.original_text: "Did your father ever talk to you about repentance?"

traits.locale_text: "Baban seninle hiç tövbe hakkında konuştu mu?"
